title: BRIEF-Janus Henderson Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of $0.73
text:
10 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Janus Henderson Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of $0.73 Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Janus Henderson Group Plc: * ‍Q4 2017 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF US$2.32​ * ‍QTRLY EPS US$0.73 ON AN ADJUSTED BASIS​ * QTRLY REVENUE $592 MILLION VERSUS $243.4 MLN‍​ 
* ‍AT QUARTER END AUM INCREASED TO US$370.8 BILLION, UP 3% FROM 30 SEPTEMBER 2017​ 
* ‍ON TRACK TO DELIVER COST SAVINGS GREATER THAN ORIGINALLY PROMISED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
